data.actual_result: The browser opens and displays an error message stating the URL cannot be shown, with a partial data URI in the address bar
data.expected_result: The browser should open and display the image. Alternatively, the Open in Browser option should be removed for pasted images
data.short_description: Pasted images cannot be previewed correctly in a browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings -> Web Browser and select In-App Browser or Safari - Go to any text channel - Paste any image into the text field - Tap the image to load the preview - Tap the ellipses (3 dots) and then Open in Browser
